import React, { Component } from 'react' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Tooltip from '@material-ui/core/Tooltip'; import '../CssFiles/Login.css' class Login extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { email: "", emailError: "error in email", password: "", passwordError: "error in pass" } } input = (event)=>{ this.setState ({ [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } render() { console.log("email entered",this.state.email); return (
Sign in your account
this.input(event)} variant="outlined" margin="dense" fullWidth />
Forgot Password?
No any account yet? create account
) } } export default Login
